name: cmake-language-model-tools
description: Give Copilot access to CMake Tools

languageModelTools.name: get_cmake_build_directory
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns the build directory for the CMake project and the active configuration. This is useful for understanding where the build artifacts are located, especially if you have multiple configurations with different build directories. Within the build directory, there's typically several useful files like a compile_commands.json file that describes how sources are compiled.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get the build directory for the current CMake project and configuration

languageModelTools.name: get_cmake_cache_variable
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Retrieves a single variable from the CMake cache (e.g. CMakeCache.txt in the build directory) with documentation and type information. If the exact variable name is not found, it will suggest the closest match and list the names of all available variable. If no variable_name is supplied, all available variable names will be returned. This is useful for getting configuration values that are kept in the CMake cache.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get a variable from the CMakeCache.txt

variable_name.description: Name of the CMake cache variable that you wish to retrieve. If not specified, all available variable names will be returned, which can be used for a follow-up query to get the value of a specific variable.

languageModelTools.name: get_cmake_targets
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Retrieves CMake targets from the current project. It describes their type, source directory, artifacts, and other relevant information.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get CMake targets from the current project

targetNames.description: Optional list of specific target names to retrieve. If not specified, returns all targets.

languageModelTools.name: build_cmake_target
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Builds the specified CMake target or all targets if none is specified. This executes the build process for the given targets.

targets.description: Optional list of target names to build. If not specified, builds all targets.

languageModelTools.name: configure_cmake_project
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Configures the CMake project, optionally deleting the cache first for a clean reconfiguration. This is useful when you need to refresh the project configuration or when CMake configuration has changed.

delete_cache.description: Whether to delete the CMake cache before configuring. If true, performs a clean reconfiguration. Defaults to false.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
